result.execSummary:
The defendant Renae R Allison was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Renae R Allison is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Renae R Allison was found guilty of Possession of synthetic cannabinoid, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(em).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
SENTENCED TO 20 DAYS IN MARQUETTE COUNTY JAIL WITH HUBER. CONSECUTIVE TO ANY OTHER SENTENCE.
MAY TRANSFER TO WOOD COUNTY.
REPORT ON OR BEFORE JANUARY 12, 2015 BY 7:00 P.M. CLEAN & SOBER.
Consecutive to: consecutive to any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Renae R Allison

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Petition for writ of habeas corpus

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Renae R Allison in court with attorney Mark J. Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee moves to amend Ct. 1 to Misd. 961.41(3g)(em).  Atty Gumz does not object.
BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1 amended to Misd. 961.41(3g)(em). 

  Atty Hendee states plea agreement to the amended Ct. 1.  Ct. 2 to be dismissed.  Atty Gumz agrees.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees and enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of the amended Ct. 1.  Ct. 2 to be dismissed.

Atty Hendee states that the defendant was just sentenced in Wood County.
Atty Gumz asks the court to follow the recommendation.


BY THE COURT:  Amended Ct. 1:  Court orders 20 days in the Marquette County Jail w/huber; consecutive to any other sentence
  Report on or before January 12, 2015 by 7:00pm, clean & sober.
May transfer to Wood County
Court Costs = $243.00
DNA Surcharge = $200.00
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in December
Ct. 2 to be dismissed.
Return date on November 13, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Renae R Allison in court with attorney Mark J. Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gumz states that the defendant will waive the Preliminary Hearing.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees and waives her right to a Prelim.
  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Hendee files the information with the court.
  Defendant received a copy of the information & waives it's reading.  Atty Gumz enters a Not Guilty plea.

BY THE COURT:  Not Guilty plea entered.
Set for Return.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for November 13, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 15, 2014 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Renae R Allison in court with attorney Mark J. Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set along with booking.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Atty Gumz waives time limits for the Prelim.

BY THE COURT:  Time limits waived.
Set for Prelim.

Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking today  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 15, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
Initial appearance on August 25, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Initial appearance on August 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
